DataSprints é uma consultoria de Engenharia & Ciência de Dados que potencializa startups e grandes corporações.

Estamos em busca de uma pessoa que seja apaixonada por dados, goste de trabalhar em um ambiente de alto aprendizado e autonomia, com as melhores tecnologias do mercado e um time de especialistas.

Neste cargo, você fará parte de um time de elite que vem atuando em projetos de Data & Analytics nas maiores startups e corporações do país. É uma grande oportunidade de se aprender com profissionais de referência e atuar em projetos que realmente tratam Big Data!

Responsabilidades e atribuições

No dia-a-dia, você será responsável por:
Desenhar e modelar novas soluções de arquitetura de dados seguras, confiáveis, disponíveis e escaláveis;
Criar e definir modelagens de repositórios de dados da instituição tais como (Data Lakes, DataWareHouses, Bases relacionais e não relacionais);
Desenvolver estratégias de aquisição de dados, recuperação de informação, implementação de pipelines de processamentos de dados e armazenamento de dados;
Manter repositórios de dados seguros e pipelines de integração confiáveis e escaláveis;
Planejar e modelar estruturas de comunicação de dados entre sistemas legados e repositórios de dados;
Implementar as melhores práticas de segurança e criptografia para ambiente Big Data.
Requisitos e qualificações

O que precisamos que você tenha:
Habilidades em programação com SQL e Python
Experiência com Cloud Computing, preferencialmente AWS
Experiência com Linux
Inglês no mínimo intermediário
Será um diferencial se você tiver:
Experiência com Data Science/Engineering
Experiência com Sistemas Distribuídos
Informações adicionais
Vale refeição/alimentação
Plano de saúde (Sul América- Abrangência Nacional)
Acompanhamento terapêutico (Vittude)
Investimento em Cursos e Certificados AWS
Você pode trabalhar de qualquer lugar do Brasil
40 horas semanais

# Sobre a Stone
A Stone é uma empresa de soluções financeiras e de tecnologia de pagamentos.
Começamos como uma startup em 2012 e hoje somos a maior adquirente independente do país com mais de 450 mil clientes.
Adotamos uma estratégia diferenciada de vendas e atendimento, com operações próprias em diversas regiões do país para entregar serviço personalizado para quem mais importa, o Cliente.
Com isso, deixamos de ser uma startup e nos tornamos uma companhia de mais de 6.000 pessoas, unidas por um único sonho: transformar este mercado, trazendo melhores tecnologias, produtos inovadores e um serviço de qualidade para a ponta.
Acreditamos que os nossos clientes merecem ter todas as suas necessidades atendidas com um único ponto de contato em apenas segundos e, por isso, investimos em estratégias que envolvem serviços de adquirência, banking e crédito, além de produtos de software que auxiliam na gestão do negócio de acordo com o segmento do empreendedor.
Nosso dia a dia? Ultrapassar limites, aprender muito e transformar potencial em potência. O seu, o da Stone e o dos nossos Clientes.
# Sobre Produtos Financeiros
Somos uma Business Unit da Stone com a missão de desenvolver e distribuir produtos financeiros que ajudem o nosso cliente a gerenciar o seu negócio e a vender mais. Acreditamos que valores como esforço, estudo, ambição e crença na capacidade do indivíduo em empreender são fundamentais para entregar diariamente a nossa missão.
Nossa área faz parte da estratégia central da Stone e nós acreditamos que, por meio de soluções financeiras de qualidade e com total transparência para nossos clientes, vamos conseguir transformar ainda mais o mercado de pagamentos brasileiro. Aqui, unimos times de Produtos, Tecnologia e Operações de vendas e atendimento, todos próprios, para que juntos consigam dar suporte aos empreendedores, entender suas demandas, pensar em melhorias e disrupções e, assim, trazer inovações que alavanquem os negócios da nossa razão: nossos clientes.
# Sobre o contexto de Dados
A Stone começou sua jornada no mercado de adquirência, as chamadas "maquininhas", mas está expandindo seu portfólio para produtos bancários e produtos financeiros, desenhados especialmente para o varejista brasileiro. Uma das maiores dores desse público hoje é o acesso a linhas de crédito e financiamento, seja para comprar mercadoria, seja para investir no seu próprio negócio.
Pensando na dor da nossa principal razão, que é o nosso cliente, estamos construindo do zero um produto de crédito inovador, que se encaixa melhor nas flutuações de faturamento do lojista, e pesa menos no seu bolso. Mesmo com aproximadamente um ano de vida, esse produto já cresceu muito, atingindo um patamar de mais de 35 mil clientes e uma carteira de mais de 400 milhões em crédito, e com um potencial de sucesso enorme pela frente!!
Porém, sendo um produto de risco, esse sucesso está atrelado à nossa capacidade de quantificar o risco, que depende fundamentalmente em sermos excepcionais na obtenção, organização e distribuição de um grande volume de dados!!!
Por conta disso, convidamos você para mergulhar de cabeça nesse desafio com a gente, e construir o estado da arte no que diz respeito a BigData, imerso em um produto que é potência e junto com um time de gigantes!!!

# O que você vai fazer
Você fará parte do time de Engenharia de Dados, que é responsável por construir as pipelines de dados que alimentam nosso Datalake, uma parte core da tese do produto de Crédito na Stone. Queremos construir uma arquitetura de dados referência no mercado, e você será peça fundamental nisso. Você participará ativamente na definição da arquitetura das soluções, escolha da stack do projeto e na implementação de fato de tais soluções, garantindo a qualidade técnica e seguindo práticas de mercado.
Principais atividades:
Construção de pipelines de dados de ponta-a-ponta, desde o mapeamento das fontes de dados até a devida distribuição para os times de negócio
Construção de fluxos de processamento de grandes volumes de dados, seja em batch ou streaming
Integração com provedores externos de dados, organização e disponibilização desses dados no Datalake para consumo
Participação ativa na definição dos stacks utilizados nos projetos
Criação de sistemas de controle das rotinas de processamento de dados
# O que buscamos em você
Hard Skills
Boa experiência em desenvolvimento de fluxos completos de engenharia de dados (ingestão, processamento e apresentação)
Desenvolvimento de pipelines de dados: Python, SQL, ETL
Ingestão e streaming de dados: Kafka
Processamento distribuído: Hadoop
Soft Skills
Saber transmitir conceitos complexos de maneira simples para os times de negócio (capacidade de abstração e síntese)
Capacidade de conceber soluções adequadas à realidade do negócio com autonomia
Conseguir manter o foco e a diligência em um ambiente de trabalho altamente dinâmico e em evolução.
Saber trabalhar em consenso com o time, com escuta ativa e garantindo convergência das ideias

Senior .Net Software Engineer
Join us as a Senior.Net Software Engineer on our Financial Services Self Service team in Brazil to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.
Key Responsibilities
Responsibilities will include the design and development of a brand new global portal for customers to manage their financial services. As you will be a member of a highly-collaborative team we expect a strong commitment, full ownership sense, focus to solve business problems by proposing clear and sophisticated solutions design, an innovative mindset. Being responsible for the development of a customer-facing application the delivery of a highly-quality product is a must and we expect that all team members face it as the top priority.
You will:
Translate application features and use cases into functional applications
Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using industry standards like Microservices APIs and responsive frontends.
Ensure the best security and possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, then propose solutions to mitigate and help to address these issues
Help maintain code quality, organization, and CI/CD automation
Essential Requirements
Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming and its best practices.
Experience in implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
Knowledge of design patterns (concurrency, data access, factory, asynchronous)
Understanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable application
Ability on writing clean, readable, and easily maintainable code with full test coverage
Desirable Requirements
Knowledge of developing cloud applications and knowledge in react JS
Proficient understanding of code versioning tool (Gitlab is a plus)

_ Our business


Through technology (mobile, AI, automation, IOT), we have created a next-generation logistics network and we are, in an unprecedented way, positioning ourselves to unleash the growth of a new trade in Brazil with a fast, cost-effective and reliable logistics solution.

By the end of 2021, we want to be present in all Brazilian cities and reach the milestone of 5 million deliveries per day by 2025.

With SoftBank, Microsoft, GGV Capital and others, the new investment round has brought Loggi’s valuation up to US$1 billion hitting the unicorn mark!

“Our mission is to deliver everything to everyone everywhere as quickly as possible. We want to connect Brazil and value, for example, Amazonian handicrafts, enabling artisans to sell without intermediaries to consumers in any region.” (Fabien Mendez, CEO - Chief Executive Officer)

_ Our Engineering team


Loggi’s engineering team is focused on solving highly complex problems, mixing up very experienced professionals and early career employees, in a fortified environment by learning, sharing of experiences and respect. Together, we will build the logistics network of the country, developing unique algorithms, systems and processes.

Our leaders have already left their mark in the national and worldwide tech scenario, working in companies like Google and UOL. They are engaged in finding how to develop a group of more than a thousand programmers to explore the knowledge borders and connect the country.

We believe and invest in everyone's potential:

"Over the next 5 years we want to train Brazil’s future CTOs! Here, we have a structured development program." (Davi Reis, CTO - Chief Technology Officer)

Requirements

_ Responsibilities


You will architect and develop high quality scalable solutions, being part of multidisciplinare squads seeking an amazing and efficient experience for the users!

As the technical focus point on a squad, we’ll count on you on the development of ideas and solutions that solve complex problems and generate great results for the team.

Loggi’s engineering team works with a wide variety of technologies and techniques to solve our challenges. We try to see beyond the buzzwords to develop software in a pragmatic and efficient way.

To spark your curiosity, we work on python/django, kotlin/micronaut; predictive models trained with sklearn and keras/tensorflow; native and hybrid apps, and PWAs; algorithms of optimization based on or-tools, Systems in Azure and AWS, with and without kubernetes. In addition we also use Looker and ELK for dashboards and analysis.

_ Requirements
3+ years of relevant work experience in software development or 6+ years in academic / technical field, regardless of language/technology;
Good knowledge of algorithms and data structure;
Experience working in a collaborative way, with others engineers, product managers and designers;
Autonomy, analytical mindset, problem solving abilities supported by best practices in coding;
Willingness to work full-stack and easy transition between technologies and languages;
Familiarity with agile trends.
Benefits

_ Our benefits


For a healthier life, we provide you:

Health plan with national coverage (without discounts!)
Dental plan (also without discounts!)
Flexible hours with the possibility of working at home according to function and demand
Discounts of up to 75% in gyms all over Brazil
Fresh fruit every day at the office

We support you with:

Above average remuneration of the best technology companies in Brazil, with annual reviews
Eligibility for Stock Options
Meal voucher and transportation voucher with symbolic discount of R$ 1
Possibility of payroll loan after 3 months of company

We develop you with:

US$ 3,300 for technical development per year
Immersion week in all areas of the company, our famous Xboarding
Frequent knowledge exchanges with internal and external professionals
Individual development plan updated every six months
Feedback culture and opportunity to work according to the squad concept
Working with big names in the history of technology in Brazil
Possibility to develop new algorithms with the challenge of creating the new generation of logistics

We help parents with:

Health and dental plan for children at no extra cost
6-month maternity leave and 20-day paternity leave
Daycare allowance of R$ 457 per child up to 5 years of age

Some of our offices also have:

Massage, manicure, pedicure at reduced costs
Pet day
Game rooms with video games, pool and others
Locker room and spaces to store your bike or scooter safely
Marketplace selling quick meals, drinks and snacks

_ Our culture


Inclusive, determined and visionary: that's who we are and how we work here.

We are already more than 1000 Loggers. We are hi-tech, little conservative and we are always up to date! Above all, we hope that everyone is eager to learn and acquire new knowledge quickly.

We look for an increasingly inspiring and welcoming work environment, and we very much hope that you will help us to maintain our culture even at an accelerated pace of growth.

We are very happy to be recognized among the best startups to work according to LinkedIn and Glassdoor, among the 10 most innovative startups by Forbes Brasil and also to be certified by Great Place to Work.

Being part of Loggi must mean that you can be who you are - or want to be. We look for a more accessible country. Thus, we can say that respecting the needs of different people is our reason for existing. This is history, it is culture, it is respect.

Important: All Loggi jobs are also open to people with disabilities (PwD).

This job description is written in English because we already have a technology office in Europe, and as we are hiring professionals from all over the world, you can have interactions with professionals who do not speak Portuguese.

Essa descrição de vaga está escrita em Inglês porque nós já temos um escritório de tecnologia na Europa e, como estamos contratando profissionais de todo o mundo, você pode ter interações com profissionais que não falam Português.

Let's go together?

_ Our business


Through technology (mobile, AI, automation, IOT), we have created a next-generation logistics network and we are, in an unprecedented way, positioning ourselves to unleash the growth of a new trade in Brazil with a fast, cost-effective and reliable logistics solution.

By the end of 2021, we want to be present in all Brazilian cities and reach the milestone of 5 million deliveries per day by 2025.

With SoftBank, Microsoft, GGV Capital and others, the new investment round has brought Loggi’s valuation up to US$1 billion hitting the unicorn mark!

“Our mission is to deliver everything to everyone everywhere as quickly as possible. We want to connect Brazil and value, for example, Amazonian handicrafts, enabling artisans to sell without intermediaries to consumers in any region.” (Fabien Mendez, CEO - Chief Executive Officer)

_ Our Engineering team


Loggi’s engineering team is focused on solving highly complex problems, mixing up very experienced professionals and early career employees, in a fortified environment by learning, sharing of experiences and respect. Together, we will build the logistics network of the country, developing unique algorithms, systems and processes.

Our leaders have already left their mark in the national and worldwide tech scenario, working in companies like Google and UOL. They are engaged in finding how to develop a group of more than a thousand programmers to explore the knowledge borders and connect the country.

We believe and invest in everyone's potential:

"Over the next 5 years we want to train Brazil’s future CTOs! Here, we have a structured development program." (Davi Reis, CTO - Chief Technology Officer)

Requirements

_ Responsibilities


You will architect and develop high quality scalable solutions, being part of multidisciplinare squads seeking an amazing and efficient experience for the users!

As the technical focus point on a squad, we’ll count on you on the development of ideas and solutions that solve complex problems and generate great results for the team.

Loggi’s engineering team works with a wide variety of technologies and techniques to solve our challenges. We try to see beyond the buzzwords to develop software in a pragmatic and efficient way.

To spark your curiosity, we work on python/django, kotlin/micronaut; predictive models trained with sklearn and keras/tensorflow; native and hybrid apps, and PWAs; algorithms of optimization based on or-tools, Systems in Azure and AWS, with and without kubernetes. In addition we also use Looker and ELK for dashboards and analysis.

_ Requirements
3+ years of relevant work experience in software development or 6+ years in academic / technical field, regardless of language/technology;
Good knowledge of algorithms and data structure;
Experience working in a collaborative way, with others engineers, product managers and designers;
Autonomy, analytical mindset, problem solving abilities supported by best practices in coding;
Willingness to work full-stack and easy transition between technologies and languages;
Familiarity with agile trends.

Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - IT Application Management
Job Description:
Senior Software Engineer, IT Application Management
Be part of a team that’s ensuring Dell Technologies' products stability and customer satisfaction. Our IT Application Management team guarantees high availability of multiple application ecosystems by providing specialized support to a great variety of technologies, designing monitoring solutions and combining continuous delivery frameworks to IT environments support practices.
Join us as an Application Management Engineer on our Information Technology team in Porto Alegre to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.
What you’ll achieve...
As an IT Application Management Engineer, you will deliver the next-generation software environment improvements, stability and integration, creating the foundation that supports new products, which will take Dell Technologies systems and business to next level — all with the most sophisticated technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and partners.
You will:
Work with business applications and cross-functional IT and business teams
Work on programs of diverse scope, applying your skills on troubleshooting and resolving disruptions of distributed system solutions
Assist in code development, test, integration and enhancements of new and existing environment management tools and automations
Collaborate on continuous improvements of application environments, with a major focus on the best user experience, performance, stability, scalability and future expansions
Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
Essential Requirements
Understanding of intersystem dependencies around primary and distributed applications;
Knowledge on monitoring, managing, resolving and documenting issues and events related to system and application environments availability;
Ability to work independently and/or as part of a team, and ability to communicate on a technical and management teams level;
Ability to lead and drive problem solving and debugging strategies for complex problems that involve multiple applications and technologies;
Technical background:
Windows and Linux based systems
Oracle Databases and Oracle Weblogic
Oracle Packages - Siebel and/or EBS
Services Oriented Architecture (SOA) and WebServices
Nice to have: IBM MQ, Cloud Based Applications
Desirable Requirements
Nice to have: Previous experience with Environment & Problem Management, ITIL and Service Desk support, leadership and team development skills, knowledge of Services Oriented Architecture, Continuous Integration/Development and Pipelines;
Clear communication, leadership, delegation and team development skills
Here’s our story; now tell us yours
Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.
What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life - while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.
We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.
You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.
Application closing date: 20 Feb 2021.
Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Introduction
As a Data Scientist at IBM, you will help transform our clients data into tangible business value by analyzing information, communicating outcomes and collaborating on product development. Work with Best in Class open source and visual tools, along with the most flexible and scalable deployment options. Whether its investigating patient trends or weather patterns, you will work to solve real world problems for the industries transforming how we live.

Your Role and Responsibilities
The IBM Chief Analytics Office (CAO) is an elite analytics consulting team that is tasked by IBM executives to pursue our most complex strategic issues. Our work is a combination of data science and management consulting. Through state of the art technology, and the power of artificial intelligence we strive to improve traditional business decision-making and processes. We are looking for computer scientists/software engineers to help design and build applications and services to enable the deployment of the machine learning/analytics solutions.

IBM Chief Analytics Office (CAO) is looking for data scientists or machine learning engineers with proven practical skills in machine learning, statistical modeling, data analysis, and data visualization.

Duties & Responsibilities:
Pull and explore large and complex datasets from different IBM databases.
Clean data and develop proof-of-concept machine learning models to resolve business question.
Write modular code and implement machine learning models into production-level solution.
Assist in setting up the infrastructure and evaluation tests
Perform data analysis and help address questions and feedback from users
Develop and deploy microservices and containers in production- and prototype-level cloud environments.

Oportunidade em São Paulo e Hortolândia/SP

Todas as nossas vagas são elegíveis para pessoas com deficiência ou reabilitadas

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
B.S. or higher degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science or related disciplines
Programming in Python (e.g., numpy, pandas, scikit-learn, keras, etc)
Experience working with a SQL data warehouse
Experience with building and explaining machine learning models
Experience with collaborative and agile management tools: GitHub
Strong English written and verbal communication skills
Ability to understand, articulate and/or document technical specification

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
Experience with a relational database: IBM DB2, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server
Established expertise building production-level software applications
Experience with distributed frameworks: Apache Spark, Storm, Flink, and/or Kafka
Experience with containerization environments: Docker, Kubernetes, or OpenShift

About Business Unit
The IBM Finance organization is responsible for driving enterprise performance and transformation. We are the financial stewards of IBM, delivering IBMs financial strategy, developing new business models, and mitigating enterprise risk. Do you have a passion for creating business value? Join our team in accounting, financial planning, pricing, business controls, tax, treasury, business development (acquisitions & divestitures), and global financing.

Your Life @ IBM
What matters to you when youre looking for your next career challenge?

Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible.

Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever.

About IBM
IBMs greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries.

Location Statement
For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Nossa área de Estratégia e Tecnologia é um pilar fundamental dos nossos negócios, sendo responsável pela nossa transformação digital. Aqui criamos soluções tecnológicas sempre idealizando e desenvolvendo técnicas e processos de automação, seja para aprimorar a experiência de trabalho das nossas equipes ou aumentar a capacidade de entrega dos nossos produtos e serviços.
Reconhecemos a importância da igualdade de oportunidades e cada vez mais valorizamos a diversidade. Todas as pessoas são bem vindas nos nossos processos e nos nossos times . Quer fazer parte disso com a gente?
Como será seu dia a dia:
Esta posição é para trabalhar no time de banco de dados responsável por acompanhar os vários projetos digitais da Globo. Procuramos um especialista de banco de dados com perfil de DevOps para trabalhar em conjunto com os times de desenvolvimento e infra buscando as soluções mais otimizadas de banco de dados para cada projeto. Este profissional será responsável por levantar, definir, implementar e acompanhar os projetos de banco de dados em ambientes na nuvem e on premisse usando diversas tecnologias como NoSQL , replicaç ã o , sharding , containers, automação, etc .
Do que você precisa:
Solida e xperiência em administração de um ou mais dos seguintes DBMS's : MySQL, MongoDB , Redis , Cassandra
Experiência em pelo menos uma das nuvens públicas: AWS, GCP, Azure, OCI
Sólidos conhecimentos de modelagem de dados e tuning de queries
Programação em banco de dados (scripts de ETL, procedures, etc)
Arquiteturas com High Availability / Sharding
Agile Frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, XP, SAFe, etc)
Inglês Avançado
Conhecimentos que podem te destacar:
Programação em Python / Ruby / Javascript / G olang
Puppet /Ansible / Terraforming
Experiência com pipelinesde CI e CD
Containers (Docker/Kubernetes)
Big Data Tools:Google Big Query, Spark , Kafka, etc.
Por que vir para Globo:
Possibilidade de impactar positivamente a vida de milhares de usuários ;
Espaço e autonomia pra você deixar a sua marca ;
Ambiente descontraído e um time incrível formado por pessoas apaixonadas pelo que fazem e referências em suas áreas de atuação ;
Incentivo ao desenvolvimento profissional constante ;
C ultura open sourc e !

Job Title: Principal Full Stack Engineer - Services IT
Job Description:
Principal Full Stack Engineer - Services IT
The Software Engineering team delivers next-generation software application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.
Join us as a IT Principal Software Engineer on our Information Technology team in Eldorado do Sul, Brazil to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What you’ll achieve
As an IT Principal Software Engineer, you will be part of a team responsible for end to end development of a Services IT product, with full ownership from defining what the product does to supporting its features for the best customer experience. Beyond code solutioning, development and testing, product lifecycle and its pillars is part of the day to day realities of the engineer in our team, including how to do the best customer engagement, how to monitor the product in multi-environments, what kind of analytics are required, self-services and customer support. The team runs in an agile environment with regular deployment to product (at least once a week) and extreme programming practices.
Working at the cutting edge, you will craft and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most sophisticated technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and partnerships.
You will:

End to End product development (from understanding requirements to supporting it in production), influencing on what product should or not have – team autonomy.
Work as real full stack engineer, coding, testing and delivering your art into production.
Innovate exploring new technologies and defining the path to the product future.
Be part of a real product team, helping to define its future, raising it to the next Customer Experience level.
Deliver product maturity within the team, concerned with Onboarding, Monitoring, Analytics, Self Service and Support.

Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements
Fast Learning and Logical Skills: Ability to apply extensive knowledge of application programming and analysis
Technical Skills: Proven experience in software development methodologies (Java SB / PCF)
Proactive Ownership: Flexible to not work just coding requirements, but owning and helping to build the best product and customer experience ever
Communication skills, also able to speak fluent Portuguese and English
Visionary and Innovative Mind: able to think out of the box to bring the best of the breed to the product and customers.

Desirable Requirements
Previous Experience with Extreme Programming Practices in an Agile Environment
Bachelor degree or equivalent in Computer Science

Propz is a technology company pioneer in the application of Big Data stack to leverage retail sales. Our system can understand customer journey, predict more attractive offers and react in real time, reaching the right customers at the right time.
The sum of CRM, advanced behavioral euristics, machine learning, combined with retail expertise allow us to automate multichannel marketing campaigns and bring consistent measurable uplift to retailer revenue.
We want to build the most powerful customer relationship machine with the ability to learn, adapt and act, regardless of human control.

Ensuring production code stability and effectiveness
Data Lake software development: DAOs, helpers, abstractions

Solid understanding of databases, data procedures, and data administration
Confident Scala and Spark in application for batch processing
Solid understanding of how JVM works

Git, STB, Maven

About Netskope


Today, there's more data and users outside the enterprise than inside, causing the network perimeter as we know it to dissolve. We realized a new perimeter was needed, one that is built in the cloud and follows and protects data wherever it goes, so we started Netskope to redefine Cloud, Network and Data Security.
Since 2012, we have built the market-leading cloud security company and an award-winning culture powered by hundreds of employees spread across offices in Santa Clara, San Francisco, Seattle, Bangalore, London, Melbourne, and Tokyo. Our core values are openness, honesty, and transparency, and we purposely developed our open desk layouts and large meeting spaces to support and promote partnerships, collaboration, and teamwork. From catered lunches and office celebrations to employee recognition events and social professional groups such as the Awesome Women of Netskope (AWON), we strive to keep work fun, supportive and interactive.Visit us at Netskope Careers and follow us on Twitter @Netskope and Facebook.
Senior Software Development Engineer in Test


At Netskope, our world class QE organization is built with engineers who love to write code to test, have the aptitude to find ways to break things, know how a cloud service should work and can build automation for day to day tasks that machines can run. Our SDETs build automation tools to do functional, regression, security, performance and load/scale testing of our services and clients. Your contributions will test software that large Fortune 500 enterprises will use and rely upon everyday.

About You


You love testing highly dynamic software and pushing it to the max and beyond for strength and resilience. You are happily challenged when faced with solving complex problems. You love digging deep into the product to find its breaking points. You love the "aha!" moment when you find the repro to a bug.

Help create and implement quality processes and requirements
Work closely with the team to replicate customer environments
Identify and communicate risks about our releases. Look beyond your specific area of responsibility and ensure our solutions deliver value to our customers
Be able to own and make quality decisions for the solution.
Own the release and be a customer advocate.

Strong Python or Go programming skills

Strong knowledge of Windows and Linux systems
Experience with and deep knowledge of the TCP/HTTP protocol suite is required

Knowledge of backend frameworks such as NodeJs
Comfortable with ambiguity and taking the initiative regarding issues and decisions

An energetic self-starter with strong analytical and troubleshooting skills, as well as the ability to wear multiple hats
#LI-NN1

# Sobre a Stone

A Stone é uma empresa de soluções financeiras e de tecnologia de pagamentos.

Começamos como uma startup em 2012 e hoje somos a maior adquirente independente do país com mais de 450 mil clientes.

Adotamos uma estratégia diferenciada de vendas e atendimento, com operações próprias em diversas regiões do país para entregar servio personalizado para quem mais importa, o Cliente.

Com isso, deixamos de ser uma startup e nos tornamos uma companhia de mais de 6.000 pessoas, unidas por um único sonho: transformar este mercado, trazendo melhores tecnologias, produtos inovadores e um serviço de qualidade para a ponta.

Acreditamos que os nossos clientes merecem ter todas as suas necessidades atendidas com um único ponto de contato em apenas segundos e, por isso, investimos em estratégias que envolvem serviços de adquirência, banking e crédito, além de produtos de software que auxiliam na gestão do negócio de acordo com o segmento do empreendedor.

Nosso dia a dia? Ultrapassar limites, aprender muito e transformar potencial em potência. O seu, o da Stone e o dos nossos Clientes.

# Sobre Produtos Financeiros

Somos uma Business Unit da Stone com a missão de desenvolver e distribuir produtos financeiros que ajudem o nosso cliente a gerenciar o seu negócio e a vender mais. Acreditamos que valores como esforço, estudo, ambição e crença na capacidade do indivíduo em empreender são fundamentais para entregar diariamente a nossa missão.

Nossa área faz parte da estratégia central da Stone e nós acreditamos que, por meio de soluções financeiras de qualidade e com total transparência para nossos clientes, vamos conseguir transformar ainda mais o mercado de pagamentos brasileiro. Aqui, unimos times de Produtos, Tecnologia e Operações de vendas e atendimento, todos próprios, para que juntos consigam dar suporte aos empreendedores, entender suas demandas, pensar em melhorias e disrupções e, assim, trazer inovações que alavanquem os negócios da nossa razão: nossos clientes.

# Sobre o contexto de Dados

A Stone começou sua jornada no mercado de adquirência, as chamadas "maquininhas", mas está expandindo seu portfólio para produtos bancários e produtos financeiros, desenhados especialmente para o varejista brasileiro. Uma das maiores dores desse público hoje é o acesso a linhas de crédito e financiamento, seja para comprar mercadoria, seja para investir no seu próprio negócio.

Pensando na dor da nossa principal razão, que é o nosso cliente, estamos construindo do zero um produto de crédito inovador, que se encaixa melhor nas flutuações de faturamento do lojista, e pesa menos no seu bolso. Mesmo com aproximadamente um ano de vida, esse produto já cresceu muito, atingindo um patamar de mais de 130 mil clientes e uma carteira de mais de 1 bilhão em crédito, e com um potencial de sucesso enorme pela frente!!

Porém, sendo um produto de risco, esse sucesso está atrelado nossa capacidade de quantificar o risco, que depende fundamentalmente em sermos excepcionais na obtenção, organização e distribuição de um grande volume de dados!!!

Por conta disso, convidamos você para mergulhar de cabeça nesse desafio com a gente, e construir o estado da arte no que diz respeito a BigData, imerso em um produto que é potência e junto com um time de gigantes!!!

# O que você vai fazer

Você fará parte do time de Engenharia de Dados, que é responsável por construir as pipelines de dados que alimentam nosso Datalake, uma parte core da tese do produto de Crédito na Stone. Queremos construir uma arquitetura de dados referência no mercado, e você será peça fundamental nisso. Você participará ativamente na definição da arquitetura das soluções, escolha da stack do projeto e na implementação de fato de tais soluções, garantindo a qualidade técnica e seguindo práticas de mercado. Também será seu papel auxiliar tecnicamente o resto do time, trazendo padrões de projeto e discutindo ideias com a equipe.

Atividades de foco:
Construção de pipelines de dados de ponta-a-ponta, desde o mapeamento das fontes de dados até a devida distribuição para os times de negócio.
Construção de fluxos de processamento de grandes volumes de dados, seja em batch ou streaming.
Integração com provedores externos de dados, organização e disponibilização desses dados no Datalake para consumo.
Participação ativa na definição dos stacks utilizados nos projetos.
Criação de sistemas de controle das rotinas de processamento de dados
# O que buscamos em você

Hard Skills
Experiência sólida em desenvolvimento de fluxos completos de engenharia de dados (ingestão, processamento e apresentação)
Desenvolvimento de pipelines de dados: Spark (Python, Scala ou Java), Git, Docker
Armazenamento e Catálogo de dados: S3, DynamoDB, Redshift, Glue, Atlas
Ingestão e streaming de dados: Kafka, Kinesis, ServiceBus
Processamento distribuído: Spark, Hadoop, Hive, MapReduce; em ambientes como AWS EMR, Databricks, Athena (Presto).
Gerenciamento de pipelines de dados: Airflow, Nifi
Bancos de dados: Oracle, SQL, Postgres, Mysql (pelo menos 1)
Soft Skills
Saber transmitir conceitos complexos de maneira simples para os times de negócio (capacidade de abstração e síntese).
Capacidade de conceber soluções adequadas realidade do negócio com autonomia.
Conseguir manter o foco e a diligência em um ambiente de trabalho altamente dinâmico e em evolução.
Saber trabalhar em consenso com o time, com escuta ativa e garantindo convergência das ideias

_ Our business


Through technology (mobile, AI, automation, IOT), we have created a next-generation logistics network and we are, in an unprecedented way, positioning ourselves to unleash the growth of a new trade in Brazil with a fast, cost-effective and reliable logistics solution.

By the end of 2021, we want to be present in all Brazilian cities and reach the milestone of 5 million deliveries per day by 2025.

With SoftBank, Microsoft, GGV Capital and others, the new investment round has brought Loggi’s valuation up to US$1 billion hitting the unicorn mark!

“Our mission is to deliver everything to everyone everywhere as quickly as possible. We want to connect Brazil and value, for example, Amazonian handicrafts, enabling artisans to sell without intermediaries to consumers in any region.” (Fabien Mendez, CEO - Chief Executive Officer)

_ Our Product team


Creating the best delivery product in Brazil is essential to our mission to connect the country. Our Product team is building this with high impact projects, hypothesis validation, launching features and actions based on the most relevant metrics to the business and feedback from customers and stakeholders.

We have a diverse team made up of Product Managers and Analysts, Designers and UX Writers. We have a wide field of opportunities that need to be identified in order to provide the best experience for our users (companies, e-commerces, restaurants, freelance deliverers and individuals).

"We believe that the main bottleneck lies in the quality of delivery. And so we are very clear about where we want to operate." (Arthur Debert, CPO - Chief Product Officer & Co-founder)

_ Responsibilities


As a Sales Engineer at Loggi, your primary role will be to understand the needs of our customers and potential customers and to ensure the success of the technological aspects of integration between Loggi products and our customers' software systems with the support of our internal product team.

Requirements

Good interpersonal and communication skills (Portuguese and English);

Technical knowledge to understand internal software systems;

Basic software engineering skills, capable of small to medium code changes (preferred by Python);

Basic solution architecture skills, being able to design and support the integration between Loggi products and customers software systems.

Intermediate project management skills, being able to coordinate and communicate as a consultant the progress of medium and large-sized projects between organizations (internal and external to Loggi).

Benefits

For a healthier life, we provide you:


Health plan with national coverage (without discounts!)

Dental plan (also without discounts!)

Flexible hours with the possibility of working at home according to function and demand

Discounts of up to 75% in gyms all over Brazil

Fresh fruit every day at the office

We support you with:


Above average remuneration of the best technology companies in Brazil, with annual reviews

Eligibility for Stock Options

Meal voucher and transportation voucher with symbolic discount of R$ 1

Possibility of payroll loan after 3 months of company

We develop you with:


US$ 3,300 for technical development per year

Immersion week in all areas of the company, our famous Xboarding

Frequent knowledge exchanges with internal and external professionals

Individual development plan updated every six months

Feedback culture and opportunity to work according to the squad concept

Working with big names in the history of technology in Brazil

Possibility to develop new algorithms with the challenge of creating the new generation of logistics

We help parents with:


Health and dental plan for children at no extra cost

6-month maternity leave and 20-day paternity leave

Daycare allowance of R$ 457 per child up to 5 years of age

Some of our offices also have:

Massage, manicure, pedicure at reduced costs

Pet day

Game rooms with video games, pool and others

Locker room and spaces to store your bike or scooter safely

Marketplace selling quick meals, drinks and snacks

_ Our culture


Inclusive, determined and visionary: that's who we are and how we work here.

We are already more than 1000 Loggers. We are hi-tech, little conservative and we are always up to date! Above all, we hope that everyone is eager to learn and acquire new knowledge quickly.

We look for an increasingly inspiring and welcoming work environment, and we very much hope that you will help us to maintain our culture even at an accelerated pace of growth.

We are very happy to be recognized among the best startups to work according to LinkedIn and Glassdoor, among the 10 most innovative startups by Forbes Brasil and also to be certified by Great Place to Work.

Being part of Loggi must mean that you can be who you are - or want to be. We look for a more accessible country. Thus, we can say that respecting the needs of different people is our reason for existing. This is history, it is culture, it is respect.

Important: All Loggi jobs are also open to people with disabilities (PwD).

Through technology (mobile, AI, automation, IOT), we have created a next-generation logistics network and we are, in an unprecedented way, positioning ourselves to unleash the growth of a new trade in Brazil with a fast, cost-effective and reliable logistics solution.

By the end of 2021, we want to be present in all Brazilian cities and reach the milestone of 5 million deliveries per day by 2025.

With SoftBank, Microsoft, GGV Capital and others, the new investment round has brought Loggi’s valuation up to US$1 billion hitting the unicorn mark!

“Our mission is to deliver everything to everyone everywhere as quickly as possible. We want to connect Brazil and value, for example, Amazonian handicrafts, enabling artisans to sell without intermediaries to consumers in any region.” (Fabien Mendez, CEO - Chief Executive Officer)

_ Our Product team


Creating the best delivery product in Brazil is essential to our mission to connect the country. Our Product team is building this with high impact projects, hypothesis validation, launching features and actions based on the most relevant metrics to the business and feedback from customers and stakeholders.

We have a diverse team made up of Product Managers and Analysts, Designers and UX Writers. We have a wide field of opportunities that need to be identified in order to provide the best experience for our users (companies, e-commerces, restaurants, freelance deliverers and individuals).

"We believe that the main bottleneck lies in the quality of delivery. And so we are very clear about where we want to operate." (Arthur Debert, CPO - Chief Product Officer & Co-founder)

_ Responsibilities


As a Sales Engineer at Loggi, your primary role will be to understand the needs of our customers and potential customers and to ensure the success of the technological aspects of integration between Loggi products and our customers' software systems with the support of our internal product team.

Requirements

Good interpersonal and communication skills (Portuguese and English);

Technical knowledge to understand internal software systems;

Basic software engineering skills, capable of small to medium code changes (preferred by Python);

Basic solution architecture skills, being able to design and support the integration between Loggi products and customers software systems.

Intermediate project management skills, being able to coordinate and communicate as a consultant the progress of medium and large-sized projects between organizations (internal and external to Loggi).

Benefits

For a healthier life, we provide you:


Health plan with national coverage (without discounts!)

Dental plan (also without discounts!)

Flexible hours with the possibility of working at home according to function and demand

Discounts of up to 75% in gyms all over Brazil

Fresh fruit every day at the office

We support you with:


Above average remuneration of the best technology companies in Brazil, with annual reviews

Eligibility for Stock Options

Meal voucher and transportation voucher with symbolic discount of R$ 1

Possibility of payroll loan after 3 months of company

We develop you with:


US$ 3,300 for technical development per year

Immersion week in all areas of the company, our famous Xboarding

Frequent knowledge exchanges with internal and external professionals

Individual development plan updated every six months

Feedback culture and opportunity to work according to the squad concept

Working with big names in the history of technology in Brazil

Possibility to develop new algorithms with the challenge of creating the new generation of logistics

We help parents with:


Health and dental plan for children at no extra cost

6-month maternity leave and 20-day paternity leave

Daycare allowance of R$ 457 per child up to 5 years of age

Some of our offices also have:

Massage, manicure, pedicure at reduced costs

Pet day

Game rooms with video games, pool and others

Locker room and spaces to store your bike or scooter safely

Marketplace selling quick meals, drinks and snacks

_ Our culture


Inclusive, determined and visionary: that's who we are and how we work here.

We are already more than 1000 Loggers. We are hi-tech, little conservative and we are always up to date! Above all, we hope that everyone is eager to learn and acquire new knowledge quickly.

We look for an increasingly inspiring and welcoming work environment, and we very much hope that you will help us to maintain our culture even at an accelerated pace of growth.

We are very happy to be recognized among the best startups to work according to LinkedIn and Glassdoor, among the 10 most innovative startups by Forbes Brasil and also to be certified by Great Place to Work.

Being part of Loggi must mean that you can be who you are - or want to be. We look for a more accessible country. Thus, we can say that respecting the needs of different people is our reason for existing. This is history, it is culture, it is respect.

Important: All Loggi jobs are also open to people with disabilities (PwD).

This job description is written in English because we already have a technology office in Europe, and as we are hiring professionals from all over the world, you can have interactions with professionals who do not speak Portuguese.

Essa descrição de vaga está escrita em Inglês porque nós já temos um escritório de tecnologia na Europa e, como estamos contratando profissionais de todo o mundo, você pode ter interações com profissionais que não falam Português.

Let's go together?

Job Title: Principal Back End Software Engineer - Dell Finance Services
Job Description:
Principal Back End Software Engineer - Dell Finance Services
Join us as a Principal Back End Software Engineer on our Dell Finance Services team in Brazil to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.
What you’ll achieve
Dell Financial Services is seeking talented Backend Software Engineers to join our energetic, fast-paced environment. You will be working with a globally distributed team on mainly moving legacy applications to your micro services echo system in our private Pivotal Cloud Foundry instance as well supporting our legacy systems. Our Software Engineers are responsible for designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting .Net Core PCF applications. Our complex financial systems range from development of consumer and internal facing web based applications, to internal batch processing systems and the new Cloud systems.
You will:
Drive and push the usage of new technologies and how to properly apply them within DFS ecosystem
Partner with architects across the organization to bring ideas to live and solution complex problems
Solve architectural and technical challenges by developing and enhancing a core product in C# using .net core
Take dev ownership and have the opportunity to support it through all its engineering lifecycle
Interact with a global and fun team, exchanging experiences and collaborating in support to business growth
Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
Essential Requirements
Solid knowledge of at least one modern object oriented programming language, e.g., C#, Java, Python. And its related tools, ecosystem and best practices.
Experience with Microservices architecture, REST APIs, libraries or utilities, and one PaaS or IaaS platform such as AWS, GCP, Azure or PCF.
Experience with .net core and asp.net core development with proven Open-Source contributions
Expert in DevOps practices
Strong English communication skills.
Desirable Requirements
Experience with Messaging Systems. e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka.
Experience with document oriented NoSQL DBs. e.g., MongoDB, CouchDB.
Here’s our story; now tell us yours
Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.
What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life - while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.
We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.
You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.
Application closing date: 10 of January of 2021.

Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Dell encourages applicants of all ages. Read the full Employment Opportunity Policy here.

CI&T is your end-to-end digital transformation partner. As a digital native, we bring a 25-year track record of accelerating business impact through complete and scalable digital solutions. With a global presence of more than 3,300 professionals in strategy, research, data science, design and engineering, we unlock top-line growth, improve customer experience and drive operational efficiency.

General Description:
We are looking for scientists who are passionate for data and are eager to tackle big challenges using Data Science and Machine Learning. The main focus of this role is to solve non-trivial business problems in Fortune 500 companies. This person will mostly work with a mix of structured and unstructured, and use scientific methods and state-of-the-art techniques and tools to help our customers achieve their business objectives.

Responsibilities:
Understand complex business problems and translate them into structured data problems.
Capture and explore complex data sets (structured and unstructured data).
Prototype Model of different complexity (business analysis, statistical models, machine learning) using modern data science tools (Notebooks, Clouds).
Design and implementation of machine learning models, metrics and application of feature engineering techniques applied to customers problems.
Conduct descriptive analysis, demand forecasting models, product purchase recommendation models and optimization models to maximize sales volume and margin;
Support pre-sales in business opportunities and the engineering teams in the implementation of production-ready solutions involving machine learning.
Evaluate hypotheses and the impact of machine learning algorithms on key business metrics. Simulations and offline/online experimentation (via A/B tests) is part of the game.
Research and understand user behavior patterns, such as user engagement and segmentation, using machine learning models, to help test hypotheses.
Communicate findings effectively to an audience of engineers and executives.

Required qualifications:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Applied Math, Statistics, Physics or other related quantitative areas.
Ability to understand mathematical models and algorithms in research papers, and to implement them into running software for Proof-of-Concepts and projects.
Ability to explore big data without a specific problem defined, in order to come up with the right questions and provide interesting findings.
Proficient in computer languages like Python, R and SQL, making use of the best frameworks for machine learning pipelines, data visualization, manipulation and transforming, models training and evaluation, and models deployment.
Experience with common feature engineering techniques and machine learning algorithms for Supervised and Unsupervised Learning, like Regression, Classification, Clustering, Dimensionality Reduction, Association Rules, Ranking and Recommender Systems.
Business sense and consulting behaviour to identify and breakdown problems, define and evaluate hypothesis.
Think critically and act in a detail-oriented fashion while keeping the "big picture" in mind.
Ability to provide creative and innovative approaches to problem solving.
Ability to work independently and within a collaborative team environment.
Advanced oral and written communication skills in English.

Desired qualifications:
Masters or PhD in Machine Learning / Data Mining / Statistics.
Experience with Bayesian and statistical methods.
Experience with Platforms for Big Data processing (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, BigQuery), Cloud Platforms and Data Viz tools (e.g. Tableau, PowerBI, R-shiny, Bokeh, D3.js).
Experience in agile methods, software engineering techniques (e.g. unit testing, refactoring, version control), design of solution architectures and software product development.

#MidSenior
#LI-NA1

CI&T is an Equal Opportunity Employer

We are actively seeking to diversify our team and build an inclusive environment where everyone feels like they belong.

QUALIFICATIONS
Undergraduate degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, information systems or related field
Up to 3 years of relevant professional work experience in a data engineering function or with a reputed analytics firm
Experience in the field of collections and /or business intelligence are a plus
Experience with dashboarding (Domo, Power BI, Tableau) will be a plus
Strong coding knowledge in SQL, medium in T-SQL and Python is required; capability in the field of large data handling through one or combination of the following: Snaplogic, Talend ,Alteryx is a plus
Understanding of data warehousing and data lake concepts, experience in building operational ETL data pipelines across a number of sources, and constructing relational and dimensional data models
Experience with Microsoft SQL Server would be an advantage
Basic knowledge of version control systems (git) is a plus
Solid problem-solving capabilities, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions
Strong interpersonal, written/verbal communications skills in English
Willingness to travel (~30% of time)
WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH
You will join the Sao Paulo office and work with the C-Insights Solution team. You will support the development of cutting edge technology assets that will help banks, retailers, telecom and utility clients be more efficient and effective in customer assistance and loss mitigation. The solution that will be deployed at clients that will leverage advanced analytics, machine learning, full stack development and data visualization capabilities to give cutting edge technology tools to our Risk practice clients around the world.
WHAT YOU'LL DO
You will help build products that leverage client data on collections to enable development and deployment of enhanced analytical models.
In this role, you will be responsible for the technical deployment of the solution at the client, including integration with client systems, database structuring, back-end customizations, and ongoing maintenance. Your work will combine ‘Agile’ with expertise in cloud and big data to help create, deploy and maintain custom solutions that helps clients increase productivity and make timely decisions.
Lastly, you will collaborate with the C-Insights Solution team of product managers, developers and technical operations firm members to design, develop and implement IT cloud-based solutions, systems and processes in order to automate provisioning, quality controls, security auditing and maintenance of the solution.

Job Title: Principal Software Engineer – AI ML Platform Engineering
Job Description:
Principal Software Engineer – AI ML Platform Engineering


Join us as a Principal Software Engineer on our AI ML Platform Software Engineering team in Brazil to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What you’ll achieve


Our AI ML Platform Software Engineering team is spearheading Dell’s Digital Transformation by driving innovation in the way we deliver advanced AI and ML technologies that can help our business units deliver improvements across our entire customer experience and optimize our business outcomes. We design and develop software with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners. This position will merge software engineering, modern dev ops, data engineering and deployment at scale to help teams deploy algorithmic models that can optimize business and customer experiences at scale. The candidate will use technical knowledge and software development to build technology centric solutions that accelerate the development of AI and ML capabilities across the company.

You will:


- Software design and development for internal and external customer products.

- Utilize a range of applicable technologies (e.g., programming languages, compilers, assemblers, debuggers, other tools) for products used in local, networked, storage enhancements and/or new systems.

- Implements system security to provide stable and secure systems platforms.

- Participates in product development in all stages from planning and design to development, testing and documentation.

- Develops high availability and highly scalable applications which will be used by both internal and external customers.

Take the first step towards your dream career
Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
Requirements:


- Solid experience in a professional role with a Bachelor’s degree

- Demonstrated experience writing and maintaining high quality code as well as documentation

- Demonstrated experience with object-oriented programming languages such as C# or Java

- Experience with cloud-native computing, cloud platforms, microservices architecture, modern DevOps, Test Driven Development and Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment.

- Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, Functions, elastic compute, enterprise-scale platforms, parallelized workloads, real-time data streams, open source frameworks.

Desirable Requirements:

- Master's degree

What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.

QUALIFICATIONS
BSc degree (between july 2019 - december 2021) in Computer Science or Engineering or related fields
Basic foundations in Software Engineering, Agile and Cloud computing
Programming skills in at least 2 of the following languages: SQL, Python, Scala, Java
Good knowledge in relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL
Basic foundations in Big Data platforms both for batch and streaming data processing like Hadoop Ecosystem, Spark, Kafka
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and effectively with people at all levels in an organization
Ability to communicate ideas most effectively - both verbally and in writing - in English
WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH
You’ll work in our São Paulo office as part of our Advanced Analytics Apprenticeship program within our QuantumBlack team.
As an Apprentice Data Engineer at QuantumBlack, you will work with other Data Scientists, Data Engineers, Machine Learning Engineers, Designers and Project Managers on interdisciplinary projects, using Maths, Stats and Machine Learning to derive structure and knowledge from raw data across various industry sectors.
You’ll typically work on projects across all industries and will be fully integrated with the rest of our global firm. You’ll work with colleagues from across the firm to help our clients launch agile marketing and personalization programs at scale, enabled by data and technology. You’ll have the opportunity to plug into exciting large scale marketing and digital transformations.
While we advocate for using the right tech for the right task, we often leverage the following technologies: Python, PySpark, SQL, Airflow, Databricks, our own OSS called Kedro, container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, cloud solutions such as AWS, GCP or Azure and more!
Our office culture is casual and social, with an emphasis on education and innovation. We have the freedom to try new ideas, experiment and are expected to be constantly learning and growing. There is also a strong emphasis on mentoring others in the group, enabling them to grow and learn.
WHAT YOU'LL DO
You will work in multi-disciplinary environments harnessing data to provide real-world impact for organizations globally.
You will help to design and build data pipelines to support data science projects, following software engineering best practices. You will use state of the art technologies to acquire, ingest, and transform big datasets.
You will help to map data fields to hypotheses and curate, wrangle, and prepare data for use in advanced analytics model. You will help to create and manage data environments in the Cloud or on premise
Please submit your CV in English
As an equal opportunity employer, QuantumBlack encourages applications from all backgrounds regardless of gender, race, disability, pregnancy, marital status, age, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, religion or belief. We maintain a sense of community rooted in respect and consideration for all employees where any evaluation is based simply upon individual work and team performance.

Procuramos um Engenheiro de Dados Pleno que será responsável por auxiliar nosso time de Data & Analytics a elevar a operação de patamar e de quebra, contribuir ativamente para o crescimento do nosso negócio.

Estamos em fase de expansão e crescimento acelerado, por isso precisamos de alguém que esteja disposto a fazer a diferença e contribuir para que os processos de ETL funcionem com excelência, trazendo insumos para tomada de decisão estratégica baseadas em dados.

É importante ter sólida vivência na área de dados, tendo atuado com banco de dados e ferramentas Self Service, plataformas cloud e servless.

Se você curte desafios, tem ambição de ser protagonista dentro de um ambiente dinâmico e ágil, com crescimento exponencial, o digio é o seu lugar!


Main responsibilities

Contribuir para o design da arquitetura de dados, modelos de dados e esquemas de tabelas.
Planejar e implementar melhorias nos processos visando: melhorar o monitoramento dos processos, melhorar a performance de extrações e transformação de dados e tornar o ambiente mais tolerante a falhas.
Construir e manter os processos/rotinas de ingestão e tratamento de dados em múltiplas fontes (ex.: Bancos de Dados, arquivos TXT e streaming de dados)
Desenhar, desenvolver e implementar soluções com dados para suportar atividades de Business Intelligence and Business Analytics.

Requirements and skills

Bacharel em Engenharia de Software, Ciência da Computação e ou Ciências Exatas. Pós Graduação em áreas correlatas a engenharia de software ou bancos dados ou sistemas de informação.
Outras formações podem ser consideradas mediante comprovação de experiência com a função
3 a 8 anos de experiência na construção de Data Warehouses, Data Lakes, Data Marts e tabelas para suportar sistemas de informação
1 a 3 anos de experiência com desenvolvimento em Python/PySpark
1 a 3 anos de experiência com computação em nuvem: AWS, Google ou Azure.
1 a 2 anos de experiência no levantamento de requisitos funcionais para a construção de indicadores de negócio
1 a 3 anos de experiência na construção de ETL em Bancos de Dados
1 a 3 anos de experiência na construção de ETL para arquivos csv, txt, json e parquet.
Forte conhecimento em linguagens programação, especialmente Python, PySpark e SQL.
Conhecer os componentes da AWS: Cloud Formation, IAM, S3, RDS, lambda, EMR, Athena, Glue and Firehouse.
Ser familiarizado com práticas ágeis: kanban e scrum
Ser familiarizado com ferramentas de controle de versão de software: Githut, Bitbucket, etc.
Conhecimento básico de Hadoop/Big Data.

Somos o digio

O digio é uma plataforma digital de serviços financeiros que apresenta diversos produtos para consumidores finais e empresas.

Lançado em 2016, o cartão de crédito com gestão por aplicativo foi seu primeiro produto. O app conta com uma loja própria– a digioStore com produtos de recarga de celular, e-Gifts, seguros, entre outros – e um clube de fidelidade de acúmulo de pontos e cashback – o digioClub –. Ainda, o digio conta com um produto de empréstimos pessoais por meio de uma plataforma digital, paperless e completamente segura.

Sua proposta de valor é ser uma plataforma agnóstica de serviços financeiros com a solidez dos bancos e agilidade das fintechs.”

We believe that learning a language should be fun, rewarding, and a gateway to the best experiences life has to offer. If you agree, we'd love to talk.

*Please note that we are not actively hiring for this role at the moment, but please feel free to submit your application as we are always on the lookout for great potential future candidates. Thanks!

If you are a software engineer looking to use your talent in teaching the world English, take a look at Voxy. Voxy software engineers will change the way millions of people around the world learn English by using sound science combined with innovative (and patented!) technology. We are implementing research-driven learning activities coupled with live streaming for topic-based live tutoring sessions using advanced algorithms to build a customized experience using authentic content sources from names you know (Bloomberg, AP, Financial Times and more.). Voxy's goal is to become THE vendor of first choice in the $80 billion dollar English language education market and our development team will be instrumental in reaching this goal.

What You'll Be Doing:
Build nicely-instrumented code that is testable and deployable without downtime
Evolve our big data pipeline to use real time feedback for an optimal platform for learners
Design a best in breed application that is enjoyable to work with, performant to our partners, and evolves with our learners
Scale the Voxy application and make it ready for feeding our upcoming projects in NLP and machine learning
What We're Looking For:
3+ years of experience working as a software developer
Curiosity and knowledge about technologies and architectural patterns of software engineering across the entire stack
Pragmatism in understanding when to build the solution that scales to 1 million users or works for 100 users
Ability to design data models that reflect the Voxy business using advanced SQL/NoSQL/ORM's
What Would Be Nice To Have:
Django or Django Rest Framework
AWS and devops
B.S. or higher in computer science, science or engineering discipline or equivalent experience
Working here, you'll enjoy:
Competitive salary and stock options
Great benefits: medical insurance, cell phone & wifi reimbursement, home office & wellness budget, team events
Remote friendly work policies
Professional development budget
Language classes w/ Voxy
Work with an awesome international team of super bright, creative, talented, and passionate individuals based in the U.S. and globally
Voxy Engineering Team's Values:
Trust
We trust our colleagues by respecting their decisions and opinions to collaborate effectively, do the right thing and maintain good working relationships.
Open Communication:
Communicate openly by sharing our thoughts (pros & cons), being outspoken, having important decisions written down for the entire team, and staying in touch with the rest of Voxy outside Engineering to ensure that the team is on the same page and build & increase trust both within the engineering team and within Voxy.
Pragmatism
Consider the impact of our choices to find an effective way to solve a problem.
Engineers Help Design the Product
Actively direct the product to design elegant features at the early stages of the design process as well as continue to improve the design when we work on them.
>>You can read more about the Voxy Engineering Team's values in an article written by Iswarya Parupudi, Co-Director of Engineering at Voxy. See link here.

Want to know more about us?

Voxy is a U.S. - based company that is changing the way the world learns English. Our proprietary personalization technology and exclusive partnerships with leading content publishers enable us to deliver a one-of-a-kind solution to over 2.5 million English learners across the globe. Our mobile and web applications make it possible for individuals to learn from the world around them, turning everyday experiences and content into fun, game-like activities. Our custom-built, live one-on-one tutoring platform brings the necessary human element front and center, and is a core piece of our methodology. Voxy's disruption of the $80B market for English language education has been recognized by leading education investors and the company has been deemed a pioneer by The New York Times, CNN Money, Fast Company, Mashable, Univision, Veja (Brazil), Venturebeat, and others.
